 64 -class ScaleAndOffsetCalibrator(Calibrator): 

 65      """ 
 66      Simple calibration procedure that obtains scale and offset factors. 
 67   
 68      This procedure simulates testing the device in 18 placements: 
 69   
 70          1. Stationary on a flat surface in 6 orthogonal orientations, such 
 71             that gravity is aligned with each direction of each IMU axis. 
 72   
 73          2. Stationary on an inclined surface in 6 orthogonal orientations, 
 74             such that magnetic north is aligned with each direction of each 
 75             IMU axis. 
 76   
 77          3. On a rotating stage of known angular velocity in 6 orthogonal 
 78             orientations, such that the axis of rotation is aligned with each 
 79             direction of each IMU axis. 
 80      """ 
 81   
 82      @prepend_method_doc(Calibrator) 

 83 -    def __init__(self, environment, samples, samplingPeriod, 
 84              rotationalVelocity): 

 85          """ 
 86          @param samples: Number of samples to take in each placement (int). 
 87          @param samplingPeriod: Time between samples (float, s). 
 88          @param rotationalVelocity: Angular rate of rotations (float, rad/s). 
 89          """ 
 90          Calibrator.__init__(self, environment) 
 91          self.samples = samples 
 92          self.samplingPeriod = samplingPeriod 
 93          self.rotationalVelocity = rotationalVelocity 

 94   

 95 -    def testTrajectories(self): 

 96          position = vectors.vector(0,0,0) 
 97          # Accelerometer test trajectories 
 98          for angles in [ 
 99              (0,-90,0),(0,90,0), # X down, X up (pitch -/+90 deg) 
100              (0,0,90),(0,0,-90), # Y down, Y up (roll +/-90 deg) 
101              (0,0,0),(0,0,180)]: # Z down, Z up (roll 0/180 deg) 
102              rotation = Quaternion().setFromEuler(angles) 
103              yield StaticTrajectory(rotation=rotation) 
104          # Magnetometer test trajectories 
105          field = self.environment.magneticField(position, 0) 
106          N = field / vectors.norm(field) 
107          E = vectors.vector(-N[1,0], N[0,0], 0) 
108          E /= vectors.norm(E) 
109          D = vectors.cross(N, E) 
110          for vectorset in [ 
111              (N,E,D), (-N,E,-D), # X north, X south 
112              (E,-N,D), (-E,N,D), # Y north, Y south 
113              (D,E,-N), (-D,E,N)]: # Z north, Z south 
114              rotation = Quaternion().setFromVectors(*vectorset) 
115              yield StaticTrajectory(rotation=rotation) 
116          # Gyro test trajectories 
117          for axis in range(3): 
118              omega = vectors.vector(0,0,0) 
119              omega[axis] = self.rotationalVelocity 
120              yield StaticContinuousRotationTrajectory(omega) 
121              yield StaticContinuousRotationTrajectory(-omega) 

122   

123 -    def calibrate(self, imu): 

124          calibration = {} 
125          position = vectors.vector(0,0,0) 
126          expected = {} 
127          measured = {} 
128          for sensor in imu.sensors: 
129              expected[sensor] = [] 
130              measured[sensor] = [] 
131          for trajectory in self.testTrajectories(): 
132              sim = Simulation(environment=self.environment) 
133              sim.time = 0 
134              imu.simulation = sim 
135              imu.trajectory = trajectory 
136              BasicIMUBehaviour(imu, self.samplingPeriod) 
137              sim.run(self.samplingPeriod * self.samples, 
138                      printProgress=False) 
139              t = sensor.rawMeasurements.timestamps 
140              for sensor in imu.sensors: 
141                  expected[sensor].append(sensor.trueValues(t)) 
142                  measured[sensor].append(sensor.rawMeasurements.values) 
143          for sensor in imu.sensors: 
144              calibration[sensor] = ScaleAndOffsetCalibration.fromMeasurements( 
145                  np.hstack(expected[sensor]), np.hstack(measured[sensor])) 
146          return calibration
